Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Increase the team's average story points per sprint

Name: maximize_feature_delivery
Description: Increase the number of features delivered per release

Name: minimize_sprint_backlog_size
Description: Reduce the number of tasks in the Sprint Backlog

Name: maximize_product_story_coverage
Description: Ensure all user stories are implemented within an epic

Name: minimize_sprint_duration
Description: Reduce the average Sprint length

Name: maximize_product_quality
Description: Increase the number of bug-free user stories

Name: minimize_team_blockers
Description: Reduce the number of blockers in the team's workflow

Name: maximize_feature_adoption
Description: Increase user adoption of new features

Name: minimize_sprint_scope_creep
Description: Reduce the change in scope during a sprint

Name: maximize_stakeholder_engagement
Description: Increase the number of stakeholders participating in sprint reviews

Name: minimize_task_complexity
Description: Reduce the effort associated with each task

Name: maximize_skill_utilization
Description: Improve the use of skills by employees

Name: minimize_feature_rework
Description: Reduce the amount of rework related to features

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Increase team satisfaction with the product and process

Name: minimize_code_complexity
Description: Reduce the cyclomatic complexity of the code

Name: maximize_user_story_acceptance
Description: Increase the percentage of user stories accepted

Name: minimize_sprint_impediments
Description: Reduce the number of impediments encountered in a sprint

Name: maximize_skill_development
Description: Improve employee skills through training

Name: minimize_feature_defects
Description: Reduce the number of defects in delivered features

Name: maximize_stakeholder_feedback
Description: Increase the frequency of stakeholder feedback

Name: minimize_team_context_switching
Description: Reduce the amount of time team members spend switching between tasks
